mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking_log ( booking_id, operation, old_status, new_status, operator, operator_ip, remark, create_time ) VALUES ( #{bookingId}, #{operation}, #{oldStatus}, #{newStatus}, #{operator}, #{operatorIp}, #{remark}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT log_id AS logId, booking_id AS bookingId, operation, old_status AS oldStatus, new_status AS newStatus, operator, operator_ip AS operatorIp, remark, create_time AS createTime FROM booking_log WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
